solution_line_template: So it took {expedition_years}+{research_years}=<<{expedition_years}+{research_years}={first_artifact_years}>>{first_artifact_years} years for the first artifact
It takes {first_artifact_years}*{second_artifact_multiplier}=<<{first_artifact_years}*{second_artifact_multiplier}={second_artifact_years}>>{second_artifact_years} years for the second
So in total it took {first_artifact_years}+{second_artifact_years}=<<{first_artifact_years}+{second_artifact_years}={total_years}>>{total_years} years to find both
